channel.title: Personal on Tedsig42
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Tedsig42

item.title: Whoami
item.description:
I’m Ted “Tedsig42” Regis Kouhouenou, a 22-year-old cybersecurity enthusiast, CTF player, music lover, and artist.
I have spent much of my time at schools such as 42 School, Epitech, and Holberton School.
I spend my free time on web security research and recently started bug bounty hunting.
From time to time, I contribute to open source projects such as Exegol, The Hacker Recipes, Payload All The Things, and other open source projects, especially when I submit patches for vulnerabilities I discover*.
I play CTF and collaborate with the @TheBugsReapers vulnerability researcher/bug hunter team.
I strive to share what I have learned on my blog tedsig42.re, which includes CTF writeups, research projects, and more.
My YouTube Channel
Currently self-employed, but open to new opportunities.
